episodes.title: A DANGEROUS CULT: INTERVIEW WITH CULT DOCUMENTARIAN PODCASTERS PT. 4 | "WE'VE DONE ALL WE CAN..."
episodes.description:
If you see the work we put into this and like what we do, please consider joining our Patreon channel --- you'll have access to content that could never be shared here! 
http://www.Patreon.com/MinivanMusician

If you have a story you'd like to see covered, some information you'd like to share that is applicable to a current investigative project or if you'd like to collaborate or book us, please contact us directly at mikewood808@gmail.com !!!

-----

At first, we made a couple comments in passing, about things we didn't think were right at Hope Village. We thought it was likely just another opportunistic group who took advantage of the people, following Hurricane Helene. Our inquisitive minds and willingness to speak for people who had been hurt soon got us in trouble with what turned out to qualify as a full-blown CULT! 

For new viewers who find our channel - and those who WILL, once our documentary on Sisters in Christ/Hope Village comes - please understand that the back-and-forth content that you see between us and that other channel is a result of our "getting close" to unearthing of the sins of that YouTuber and the above-mentioned growing cult. All will be exposed in just a couple of weeks and it'll all make sense. 

We never thought that the slightest bit of investigative journalism and documentation could put us where we are NOW: living in danger and under threats from people who are pretending to do God's work, but who are grifting and abusing! 

"Minivan Musician" have found themselves in a place of no turning back; the many people they've interviewed deserve to be heard...the communities need to be heard...the cult needs to be broken up before it reaches levels that are dangerous for the entire Western North Carolina region - and possibly beyond! 

This 4-part interview is a chance for people to hear what it's like behind-the-scenes when you're exercising your First Amendment rights and informing people about what to look out for, in terms of groups who may not be what they advertise themselves to be! 

#cult #investigativejournalism #wnc #helene #appalachianchannel #hopevillage
